verses.verse: מִ֥י <WH4310> Who הֶאֱמִ֖ין <WH539> Who hath believed לִשְׁמֻעָתֵ֑נוּ <WH8052> bruit וּזְר֥וֹעַ <WH2220> has the arm יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD עַל־ <WH5921> and מִ֥י <WH4310> Who נִגְלָֽתָה׃ <WH1540> revealed

וַיַּ֨עַל <WH5927> For he shall grow up כַּיּוֹנֵ֜ק <WH3126> him as a tender plant לְפָנָ֗יו <WH6440> before וְכַשֹּׁ֙רֶשׁ֙ <WH8328> and as a root מֵאֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> ground צִיָּ֔ה <WH6723> out of a dry לֹא־ <WH3808> has no תֹ֥אַר <WH8389> he hath no form ל֖וֹ וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> Nor הָדָ֑ר <WH1926> nor comeliness וְנִרְאֵ֥הוּ <WH7200> and when we shall see וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> Nor מַרְאֶ֖ה <WH4758> him [there is] no beauty וְנֶחְמְדֵֽהוּ׃ <WH2530> that we should desire

נִבְזֶה֙ <WH959> He is despised וַחֲדַ֣ל <WH2310> and rejected אִישִׁ֔ים <WH376> of men אִ֥ישׁ <WH376> a man מַכְאֹב֖וֹת <WH4341> of sorrows וִיד֣וּעַ <WH3045> and acquainted חֹ֑לִי <WH2483> with grief וּכְמַסְתֵּ֤ר <WH4564> and we hid as it were פָּנִים֙ <WH6440> [our] faces מִמֶּ֔נּוּ <WH4480> at נִבְזֶ֖ה <WH959> from him he was despised וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> did not חֲשַׁבְנֻֽהוּ׃ <WH2803> and we esteemed

אָכֵ֤ן <WH403> Surely חֳלָיֵ֙נוּ֙ <WH2483> our griefs ה֣וּא <WH1931> Himself נָשָׂ֔א <WH5375> he hath borne וּמַכְאֹבֵ֖ינוּ <WH4341> our sorrows סְבָלָ֑ם <WH5445> and carried וַאֲנַ֣חְנוּ <WH587> ourselves חֲשַׁבְנֻ֔הוּ <WH2803> yet we did esteem נָג֛וּעַ <WH5060> him stricken מֻכֵּ֥ה <WH5221> smitten אֱלֹהִ֖ים <WH430> of God וּמְעֻנֶּֽה׃ <WH6031> and afflicted

וְהוּא֙ <WH1931> He מְחֹלָ֣ל <WH2490> But he [was] wounded מִפְּשָׁעֵ֔נוּ <WH6588> for our transgressions מְדֻכָּ֖א <WH1792> [he was] bruised מֵעֲוֹנֹתֵ֑ינוּ <WH5771> for our iniquities מוּסַ֤ר <WH4148> the chastisement שְׁלוֹמֵ֙נוּ֙ <WH7965> of our peace עָלָ֔יו <WH5921> and by וּבַחֲבֻרָת֖וֹ <WH2250> [was] upon him and with his stripes נִרְפָּא־ <WH7495> we are healed לָֽנוּ׃

כֻּלָּ֙נוּ֙ <WH3605> All כַּצֹּ֣אן <WH6629> All we like sheep תָּעִ֔ינוּ <WH8582> have gone astray אִ֥ישׁ <WH376> every one לְדַרְכּ֖וֹ <WH1870> to his own way פָּנִ֑ינוּ <WH6437> we have turned וַֽיהוָה֙ <WH3068> and the LORD הִפְגִּ֣יעַ <WH6293> hath laid בּ֔וֹ אֵ֖ת <WH853> עֲוֹ֥ן <WH5771> on him the iniquity כֻּלָּֽנוּ׃ <WH3605> all

נִגַּ֨שׂ <WH5065> He was oppressed וְה֣וּא <WH1931> and He נַעֲנֶה֮ <WH6031> and he was afflicted וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> did not יִפְתַּח־ <WH6605> yet he opened פִּיו֒ <WH6310> not his mouth כַּשֶּׂה֙ <WH7716> as a lamb לַטֶּ֣בַח <WH2874> to the slaughter יוּבָ֔ל <WH2986> he is brought וּכְרָחֵ֕ל <WH7353> and as a sheep לִפְנֵ֥י <WH6440> before גֹזְזֶ֖יהָ <WH1494> her shearers נֶאֱלָ֑מָה <WH481> is dumb וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> did not יִפְתַּ֖ח <WH6605> so he openeth פִּֽיו׃ <WH6310> not his mouth

מֵעֹ֤צֶר <WH6115> from prison וּמִמִּשְׁפָּט֙ <WH4941> and from judgment לֻקָּ֔ח <WH3947> He was taken וְאֶת־ <WH853> דּוֹר֖וֹ <WH1755> his generation מִ֣י <WH4310> who יְשׂוֹחֵ֑חַ <WH7878> and who shall declare כִּ֤י <WH3588> for נִגְזַר֙ <WH1504> was cut מֵאֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> out of the land חַיִּ֔ים <WH2416> of the living מִפֶּ֥שַׁע <WH6588> for the transgression עַמִּ֖י <WH5971> of my people נֶ֥גַע <WH5061> was he stricken לָֽמוֹ׃

וַיִּתֵּ֤ן <WH5414> And he made אֶת־ <WH854> with רְשָׁעִים֙ <WH7563> with the wicked קִבְר֔וֹ <WH6913> his grave וְאֶת־ <WH854> was with עָשִׁ֖יר <WH6223> and with the rich בְּמֹתָ֑יו <WH4194> in his death עַ֚ל <WH5921> Because לֹא־ <WH3808> no חָמָ֣ס <WH2555> no violence עָשָׂ֔ה <WH6213> because he had done וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> Nor מִרְמָ֖ה <WH4820> neither [was any] deceit בְּפִֽיו׃ <WH6310> in his mouth

וַיהוָ֞ה <WH3068> the LORD חָפֵ֤ץ <WH2654> Yet it pleased דַּכְּאוֹ֙ <WH1792> to bruise הֶֽחֱלִ֔י <WH2470> him he hath put [him] to grief אִם־ <WH518> If תָּשִׂ֤ים <WH7760> when thou shalt make אָשָׁם֙ <WH817> an offering for sin נַפְשׁ֔וֹ <WH5315> his soul יִרְאֶ֥ה <WH7200> he shall see זֶ֖רַע <WH2233> [his] seed יַאֲרִ֣יךְ <WH748> he shall prolong יָמִ֑ים <WH3117> [his] days וְחֵ֥פֶץ <WH2656> and the pleasure יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD בְּיָד֥וֹ <WH3027> in his hand יִצְלָֽח׃ <WH6743> shall prosper

מֵעֲמַ֤ל <WH5999> of the travail נַפְשׁוֹ֙ <WH5315> of his soul יִרְאֶ֣ה <WH7200> He shall see יִשְׂבָּ֔ע <WH7646> [and] shall be satisfied בְּדַעְתּ֗וֹ <WH1847> by his knowledge יַצְדִּ֥יק <WH6663> justify צַדִּ֛יק <WH6662> shall my righteous עַבְדִּ֖י <WH5650> servant לָֽרַבִּ֑ים <WH7227> many וַעֲוֹנֹתָ֖ם <WH5771> their iniquities ה֥וּא <WH1931> He יִסְבֹּֽל׃ <WH5445> for he shall bear

לָכֵ֞ן <WH3651> Therefore אֲחַלֶּק־ <WH2505> Therefore will I divide ל֣וֹ בָרַבִּ֗ים <WH7227> him [a portion] with the great וְאֶת־ <WH854> with עֲצוּמִים֮ <WH6099> with the strong יְחַלֵּ֣ק <WH2505> and he shall divide שָׁלָל֒ <WH7998> the spoil תַּ֗חַת <WH8478> Thahash אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> he הֶעֱרָ֤ה <WH6168> because he hath poured out לַמָּ֙וֶת֙ <WH4194> unto death נַפְשׁ֔וֹ <WH5315> his soul וְאֶת־ <WH854> with פֹּשְׁעִ֖ים <WH6586> with the transgressors נִמְנָ֑ה <WH4487> and he was numbered וְהוּא֙ <WH1931> Himself חֵטְא־ <WH2399> the sin רַבִּ֣ים <WH7227> of many נָשָׂ֔א <WH5375> and he bare וְלַפֹּשְׁעִ֖ים <WH6586> for the transgressors יַפְגִּֽיעַ׃ <WH6293> and made intercession ס
